content.en: Efficient compression algorithms: Researchers are using algorithms to design efficient and cost-effective architectures for various applications of image and video compression. These algorithms are being employed to reduce the complexity of hardware implementations, minimize the need for multiplications, and optimize the use of additions and shifts. By leveraging these algorithms, researchers aim to improve the performance and functionality of digital signal processing systems.
content.da: Effektive komprimeringsalgoritmer: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at designe effektive og omkostningseffektive arkitekturer til forskellige anvendelser af billede- og videokomprimering. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at reducere kompleksiteten af hardwareimplementeringer, minimere behovet for multiplikationer og optimere brugen af additioner og skift. Ved at udnytte disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre ydeevnen og funktionaliteten af digitale signalbehandlingssystemer.
